Installed Lightning 1.1 to Seamonkey 2.6


Actual results:

It works, but there is visible annoying problem with Today Pane integration - see attached picture.

comments.text: Tested on SeaMonkey from OpenSUSE repositories.
comments.raw_text: Tested on SeaMonkey from OpenSUSE repositories.
Is this the SeaMonkey default theme or some custom theme?
comments.creator: ssitter@gmail.com
comments.text: Is this the SeaMonkey default theme or some custom theme?
comments.author: ssitter@gmail.com

comments.text: "Seamonkey Modern" theme is used. This theme is standard part of SeaMonkey installation on all platforms.
comments.raw_text: "Seamonkey Modern" theme is used. This theme is standard part of SeaMonkey installation on all platforms.
comments.creator: mhejpetr@mhn.cz
comments.author: mhejpetr@mhn.cz

comments.text:
I don't see this with SeaMonkey trunk builds and Lightning 1.4a1
Do you see this in the Default (Classic) theme? Go to the addons manager and disable all extensions except for Lightning.
comments.raw_text:
I don't see this with SeaMonkey trunk builds and Lightning 1.4a1
Do you see this in the Default (Classic) theme? Go to the addons manager and disable all extensions except for Lightning.
comments.author: philip.chee@gmail.com
comments.creator: philip.chee@gmail.com
philip.chee@gmail.com
comments.text: What is your Zoom level? View-> Zoom
comments.author: philip.chee@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: What is your Zoom level? View-> Zoom

comments.text:
(In reply to Philip Chee from comment #5)
> What is your Zoom level? View-> Zoom

Zoom level is 100%.
In Default (Classic) theme it is OK. Seems in combination with "Seamonkey Modern" theme (distributed with SeaMonkey) it is problematic.
This problem started from SeaMonkey 2.5 and Lightning 1.0. It was perfect also in "Seamonkey Modern" theme in the past.
comments.raw_text:
(In reply to Philip Chee from comment #5)
> What is your Zoom level? View-> Zoom

Zoom level is 100%.
In Default (Classic) theme it is OK. Seems in combination with "Seamonkey Modern" theme (distributed with SeaMonkey) it is problematic.
This problem started from SeaMonkey 2.5 and Lightning 1.0. It was perfect also in "Seamonkey Modern" theme in the past.

comments.author: philip.chee@gmail.com
comments.creator: philip.chee@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Well Modern doesn't work in safe mode so go to Tools->Addons and disable all extensions and restart. See if the problem persists.

Also in about:config what do you have for
layout.css.dpi
comments.text:

Lighting 1.1 is now very old version, and I hope that bug do not exist anymore? I am pleasent to my panels. I just looked already reported bugs before filling new, and I hope that fixed would be marked closed.
